name: FlokiFi
description: FlokiFi ($FLOKIFI), a project that's gaining attention in the crypto world. - The team behind FlokiFi raised an impressive 80 BNB in just one second. FlokiFi offers a reward system for users who engage with the project: - Successfully ratio a post and earn 50% of the points it generates. - Engage on a comment before it successfully ratios an original post to earn 5% of the original post's points. Original posts receive a 5x point multiplier compared to comments. Engage with any comment that contains the "$FLOKIFI" ticker, including liking, commenting, reposting, and quote reposting. FlokiFi has also provided a point calculator to estimate the points your post could earn based on certain criteria. If you're interested in exploring a new cryptocurrency project, consider checking out FlokiFi and connecting with the community. Always remember to do your own research before getting involved in any cryptocurrency project. Happy trading!
